meanings.definition: A person who pretends to be someone else for amusement or deception.
meanings.sent1: The pseud at the party pretended to be a famous actor.
meanings.sent2: She knew he was a pseud when he claimed to be a secret agent.
meanings.sent3: The pseud's disguise was so obvious that everyone saw through it.
meanings.sent4: Becoming a pseud online can be like wearing a mask in a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The pseud's ability to mimic voices made them a master of deception.

meanings.definition: A false or pretended identity or persona.
meanings.sent1: The pseud used a fake name to hide their true identity.
meanings.sent2: His online pseud was a clever alter ego for gaming.
meanings.sent3: The pseud's double life as a superhero was revealed at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of espionage, a pseud can be more powerful than a real name.
meanings.sent5: Creating a pseud can be like crafting a character in a story.

meanings.sent1: The pseud diamond turned out to be a cheap imitation.
meanings.sent2: Her pseud smile didn't fool anyone about her true feelings.
meanings.sent3: The pseud designer handbag looked real from afar.
meanings.sent4: His pseud confidence masked his insecurities.
meanings.sent5: The pseud gold watch glittered but was actually made of plastic.
